interactive

Class BoardHandling

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactive.BoardHandling

  • public class BoardHandling
extends java.lang.Object
    Central connection class between the graphical user interface and the board database.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      CoordinateTransform coordinate_transform
      For ransforming coordinates between the user and the board coordinate space
      GraphicsContext graphics_context
      The graphical context for drawing the board.
      Logfile logfile
      The file used for logging interactive action, so that they can be replayed later
      ScreenMessages screen_messages
      The text message fields displayed on the screen
      Settings settings
      The current settings for interactive actions on the board

      • read_design

        public boolean read_design(java.io.ObjectInputStream p_design,
                           TestLevel p_test_level)
        Reads an existing board design from the input stream. Returns false, if the input stream does not contains a legal board design.
        Parameters:
        p_design - a ObjectInputStream object.
        p_test_level - a TestLevel object.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • import_design

        public DsnFile.ReadResult import_design(java.io.InputStream p_design,
                                        BoardObservers p_observers,
                                        IdNoGenerator p_item_id_no_generator,
                                        TestLevel p_test_level)
        Imports a board design from a Specctra dsn-file. The parameters p_item_observers and p_item_id_no_generator are used, in case the board is embedded into a host system. Returns false, if the dsn-file is currupted.
        Parameters:
        p_design - a java$io$InputStream object.
        p_observers - a BoardObservers object.
        p_item_id_no_generator - a IdNoGenerator object.
        p_test_level - a TestLevel object.
        Returns:
        a DsnFile.ReadResult object.

      • export_to_dsn_file

        public boolean export_to_dsn_file(java.io.OutputStream p_output_stream,
                                  java.lang.String p_design_name,
                                  boolean p_compat_mode)
        Writes the currently edited board design to a text file in the Specctra dsn format. If p_compat_mode is true, only standard speecctra dsn scopes are written, so that any host system with an specctra interface can read them.
        Parameters:
        p_output_stream - a OutputStream object.
        p_design_name - a String object.
        p_compat_mode - a boolean.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

        p_output_stream - a OutputStream object.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

        public boolean save_design_file(java.io.ObjectOutputStream p_object_stream)

        Parameters:
